article_text:
Bill for Medicaid managed care goes to McCrory

Opponents argue against provisions allowing commercial HMOs

Changes won’t come for years

article_metadata.news-keywords: Medicaid, North Carolina, NC, managed care, House, Senate, legislature, General Assembly, McCrory, bill
article_metadata.description: The state began moving toward managed care for Medicaid recipients Tuesday despite a persistent group of dissenters who argue that the plan rejects a system run by doctors that for years has helped hold down costs.
article_metadata.title: NC legislature approves Medicaid privatization | News & Observer
